price: 12. Waxaa beeniyey (Rususha) iyaga hortood qoladii Nuux, Caad iyo Fircoon ee lahaa boqortooyo xoog leh6.
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ
footnotes: 6. Dhismooyin dhaadheer iyo ciidammo tiro badan iyo tiirar uu dadka geeyo ciqaab ahaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wafir'ʿawnu dhū al-awtādi
